title: Real-World Task-Based MOOC Learner Engagement and Reward System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Learners simultaneously achieve theoretical application skills and economic motivation through performing practical tasks in the science field

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to connect theory with practice by completing five or more real-world science tasks (data analysis, experimental design, etc.) linked to MOOC platforms
Learners complete over 80% of tasks provided on online marketplaces (e.g., Upwork) meeting quality standards
Learners submit the reward amount earned during task performance in conjunction with an attendance rate of 70% or higher at the end of the course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
